lines.value: pasport ialah dokumen perjalanan yang dikeluarkan oleh sebuah kerajaan negara yang biasanya mengenal pasti pemegangnya sebagai warganegara negara yang mengeluarkan dokumen itu dan meminta agar pemegang dibenarkan masuk dan melalui negara negara lain

lines.value: pasport adalah dokumen yang mengesahkan identiti dan kewarganegaraan mempunyai dokumen itu tidak dengan sendirinya memberikan apa apa hak seperti perlindungan oleh konsulat negara yang mengeluarkan pasport walaupun ia mungkin menunjukkan bahawa individu itu mempunyai hak hak tersebut

lines.value: all slavic languages are descendants of proto slavic their parent language

lines.value: according to some historical linguistics theories proto slavic in turn developed from the proto balto slavic language a common ancestor of proto baltic the parent of the baltic languages
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: according to this theory the urheimat of proto balto slavic lay in the territories surrounding today's lithuania at some time after the indo european language community had separated into different dialect regions c
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: slavic and baltic speakers share at least 289 words which could have come from that hypothetical language
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: according to some linguists the process of separation of proto slavic speakers from proto baltic speakers presumably occurred around 1000 bc some linguists maintain however that the slavic group of languages differs more radically from the neighboring baltic group lithuanian latvian and the now extinct old prussian
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: a minority of linguists spurred by the idea of geolinguistics view the southern branch of the slavic languages as possibly autochthonous to the balkans
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the proto slavic language existed approximately to the middle of the first millennium ad by the 7th century it had broken apart into large dialectal zones
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: there are no reliable hypotheses about the nature of the subsequent breakup of west and south slavic
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: east slavic is generally thought to converge to one old russian language which existed until at least the twelfth century
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: it is now believed that south slavs came to the balkans in two streams and that between them was a large non slavic population of vlachs
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: linguistic differentiation received impetus from the dispersion of the slavic peoples over large territory which in central europe exceeded the current extent of slavic speaking majorities
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: written documents of the 9th 10th and 11th centuries already have some local linguistic features
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: for example the freising monuments show a language which contains some phonetic and lexical elements peculiar to slovenian dialects e.g rhotacism the word krilatec
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: first slavic literatures originated in the south and east slavic countries where saints cyril and methodius invented cyrillic and glagolithic scripts for slavic languages in the 9th century
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the only substantial body of medieval slavic literature is preserved in old east slavic with such masterpieces as ilarion's lay of the grace and beauty mid-11th century and the incomparable lay of igor's campaign the only medieval slavic epic in existence
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the primary chronicle was the only major historic document written in a medieval slavic language
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in effect the development of literature in local languages was suppressed by the popularization of latin
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the first substantial literary records of the polish and czech appear three centuries after the literary flowering of kievan rus
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in the west there was a clear separation between the people's language and the language of high culture

lines.value: only during the renaissance vernaculars became more popular in literature then latin in dubrovnik ivan gundulic in dalmatia in poland jan kochanowski in bohemia jan hus

lines.value: on the other hand the church with its control on education system was an important factor facilitating the spread of literacy and other knowledge
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: at about the same time the serbs and the bulgarians suppressed under the ottomans and in the austro hungarian empire began to awaken with a national consciousness to the monumental task of reforming their languages
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: both in bulgaria and in serbia the church resisted these attempts fearing revolution and seeing language reform as an attempt of assimilation by the west
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: while vuk karadzic was fighting with the patriarch in vojvodina for his attempts at ensuring a uniform literary and spoken language inside bulgaria the church tried to establish firmly the church slavonic language as the literary language of the country
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the current state of many slavic languages reveals foreign influence some of it executed by the literati as the french words of polish or the russian words of bulgarian while some came from extensive bilingualism such as the turkish words in the bulgarian and serbian the german words in slovenian and the polish words in belarussian and ukrainian
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the movement of slavic speakers into the balkans in the declining centuries of the byzantine empire expanded the area of slavic speech but pre existing languages notably greek survived in this area
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the arrival of the hungarians in pannonia in the 9th century interposed non slavic speakers between south and west slavs
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: frankish conquests completed the geographical separation between these two groups severing the connection between slavs in lower austria moravians from those in present day styria carinthia and east tyrol ancestors of present day slovenians
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: political situations have also affected the use and scope of the slavic languages
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in the course of their history many slavic speaking communities came under foreign rule for longer or shorter periods
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: poland underwent partition german speaking empires appeared to absorb the czechs for many centuries and the ottomans in their hey day dominated the balkan slavs
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: even the eastern slavs had to submit to the tatar yoke after the mongol invasion of rus
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the largest geographical extent of slavic population which in the middle ages included the majority of the present day german lands of brandenburg and pomerania diminished in the course of the german drang nach osten
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: turkish incursions suppressed the regional hegemonies of bulgarian and serbian speakers poland suffered decline partition and extinction as a separate national state in the 18th century
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: until the 20th century certain speech groups such as speakers of slovenian lacked the resources to establish their own distinctive independent nation states
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: other communities speakers of sorbian or of kashubian for example remain as minorities in the current system of nation states
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: some speech communities have long stood under the influence of others even other slavs speakers of ukrainian and belarusian came under polish and or russian rule german speaking overlords have long dominated the sorbian speakers
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in the case of west slavic speakers originally kindred languages diverged when the poles czechs and slovaks became parts of different countries poland bohemia kingdom of hungary respectively slovak becoming considerably influenced by czech after 1400/1500
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: a political division austria kingdom of hungary also marks the now well established border between the slovenian and croatian language areas even if some bordering dialects of the two languages indicate an almost smooth transition
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: despite their frequent lack of political power speakers of slavic languages demonstrated resilience sometimes culturally taking over foreign political rulers as in bulgaria where bulgar overlords became slavicized
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: similarly in the republic of dubrovnik croatian became an official language in parallel to ragusan dalmatian and latin
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: even under the ottoman empire south eastern europe except for greece proper and albanian romanian and hungarian areas remained slavic speaking
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the romanian and hungarian languages witness the influence of the neighboring slavic nations especially in the vocabulary pertaining to crafts and trade the major cultural innovations at times when few long range cultural contacts took place
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: despite a comparable extent of historical proximity the germanic languages show no significant slavic influence one notable exception being the word for border modern german grenze dutch grens from the common slavic *granica the only germanic language that shows significant slavic influence is yiddish

lines.value: most languages of the former soviet union russia and neighbouring countries for example mongolian are significantly influenced by russian especially in vocabulary

lines.value: hanamichi sakuragi ialah watak utama bagi siri anime slam dunk dan pemain bola keranjang bagi pasukan sekolah menengah tinggi shohoku

lines.value: dia bermusuhan dengan ahli sepasukannya rokawa kaede.tapi dia mencoba untuk menjadi pemain hebat dengan melawan ryonan di latih tanding,hanamichi bermain bagus tapi shohoku kalah 87-86.sejak saat itu ia berjanji untuk menjadi pemain hebat,shohoku kedatangan pemain baru bernama ryota myagi.pemain hebat tetapihanamichi sempat bermusuhan.setelah hanamichi tahu rytota suka dengan ayako(asisten anzai)hanamichi langsung menceritakan bahwa ia suka dengan haruko(adik dari takenori akagi).saat berlatih shohoku diganngu hisasi mitsui.ia adalah pemain bola keranjang tetapi posisi nya digantikan ryota.jadi,mitsui ingin membalas dendam kepada ryota,dibantu tetsuo(petarung jalanan)ia menghajar ryota dan lainya,tapi kaede dan hanamichi langsung beraksi dan hanamichi dibantu oleh tim samseng nya menghajar tetsuo dengan habis.lalu kogure menceritakan kembali tentang karir hisashi mitsui di smp

lines.value: the babylonians may have known the general rules for measuring areas and volumes
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: they measured the circumference of a circle as three times the diameter and the area as one twelfth the square of the circumference which would be correct if n is estimated as 3
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the volume of a cylinder was taken as the product of the base and the height however the volume of the frustum of a cone or a square pyramid was incorrectly taken as the product of the height and half the sum of the bases
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the pythagorean theorem was also known to the babylonians
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: also there was a recent discovery in which a tablet used n as 3 and 1/8
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the babylonians are also known for the babylonian mile which was a measure of distance equal to about seven miles today
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this measurement for distances eventually was converted to a time mile used for measuring the travel of the sun therefore representing time
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the ancient babylonians had known of theorems on the ratios of the sides of similar triangles for many centuries but they lacked the concept of an angle measure and consequently studied the sides of triangles were studied instead
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the babylonian astronomers kept detailed records on the rising and setting of stars the motion of the planets and the solar and lunar eclipses all of which required familiarity with angular distances measured on the celestial sphere
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: there is also evidence that the babylonians first used trigonometric functions based on a table of numbers written on the babylonian cuneiform tablet plimpton 322 circa 1900 bc which can be interpreted as a trigonometric table of secants
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in each row of the plimpton 322 tablet the number in the second column can be interpreted as the shortest side s of a right triangle and the number in the third column can be interpreted as the hypotenuse d of the triangle
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the number in the first column is either the fraction where l denotes the longest side of the same right triangle
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: however scholars differ on how these numbers were generated and why the babylonians would have been interested in such tables
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: neugebauer 1951 argued for a number theoretic interpretation pointing out that this table provides a list of pairs of numbers from pythagorean triples
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: for instance line 11 of the table can be interpreted as describing a triangle with short side 3/4 and hypotenuse 5/4 forming the side:hypotenuse ratio of the familiar 34,5 right triangle
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: if p and q are two coprime numbers then form a pythagorean triple and all pythagorean triples can be formed in this way
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: for instance line 11 can be generated by this formula with p = 1 and q = 1/2
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: as neugebauer argues each line of the tablet can be generated by a pair p,q that are both regular numbers integer divisors of a power of 60
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this property of p and q being regular leads to a denominator that is regular and therefore to a finite sexagesimal representation for the fraction in the first column
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: neugebauer's explanation is the one followed e.g by conway and guy 1996
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: however as robson points out neugebauer's theory fails to explain how the values of p and q were chosen there are 92 pairs of coprime regular numbers up to 60 and only 15 entries in the table
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in addition it does not explain why the table entries are in the order they are listed in nor what the numbers in the first column were used for
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: joyce 1995 provides a trigonometric explanation the values of the first column can be interpreted as the squared cosine or tangent depending on the missing digit of the angle opposite the short side of the right triangle described by each row and the rows are sorted by these angles in roughly one degree increments
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: however robson argues on linguistic grounds that this theory is conceptually anachronistic it depends on too many other ideas not present in the record of babylonian mathematics from that time
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: robson 20012002 based on prior work by bruins 19491955 and others instead takes an approach that in modern terms would be characterized as algebraic though she describes it in concrete geometric terms and argues that the babylonians would also have interpreted this approach geometrically
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: robson bases her interpretation on another tablet ybc 6967 from roughly the same time and place
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this tablet describes a method for solving what we would nowadays describe as quadratic equations of the form by steps described in geometric terms in which the solver calculates a sequence of intermediate values v 1 = c/2 v 2 = v 1 2 , v 3 = 1 + v 2 , and v 4 = v 3 1/2 , from which one can calculate x = v 4 + v 1 and 1/x = v 4 v 1
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: robson argues that the columns of plimpton 322 can be interpreted as the following values for regular number values of x and 1/x in numerical order v 3 in the first column v 1 = x 1/x)/2 in the second column and v 4 = x + 1/x)/2 in the third column
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: in this interpretation x and 1/x would have appeared on the tablet in the broken off portion to the left of the first column
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: for instance row 11 of plimpton 322 can be generated in this way for x = 2
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: thus the tablet can be interpreted as giving a sequence of worked out exercises of the type solved by the method from tablet ybc 6967
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: it could robson suggests have been used by a teacher as a problem set to assign to students
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: since the rediscovery of the babylonian civilization it has become apparent that greek and hellenistic mathematicians and astronomers and in particular hipparchus borrowed a lot from the chaldeans
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: franz xaver kugler demonstrated in his book die babylonische mondrechnung the babylonian lunar computation freiburg im breisgau 1900 the following ptolemy had stated in his almagest iv.2 that hipparchus improved the values for the moon's periods known to him from even more ancient astronomers by comparing eclipse observations made earlier by the chaldeans and by himself
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: however kugler found that the periods that ptolemy attributes to hipparchus had already been used in babylonian ephemerides specifically the collection of texts nowadays called system b sometimes attributed to kidinnu
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: apparently hipparchus only confirmed the validity of the periods he learned from the chaldeans by his newer observations
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: it is clear that hipparchus and ptolemy after him had an essentially complete list of eclipse observations covering many centuries
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: most likely these had been compiled from the diary tablets these are clay tablets recording all relevant observations that the chaldeans routinely made
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: preserved examples date from 652 bc to ad 130 but probably the records went back as far as the reign of the babylonian king nabonassar ptolemy starts his chronology with the first day in the egyptian calendar of the first year of nabonassar i.e 26 february 747 bc this raw material by itself must have been hard to use and no doubt the chaldeans themselves compiled extracts of e.g all observed eclipses some tablets with a list of all eclipses in a period of time covering a saros have been found
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this allowed them to recognise periodic recurrences of events
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: among others they used in system b cf
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: almagest iv.2 similarly various relations between the periods of the planets were known
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the relations that ptolemy attributes to hipparchus in almagest ix.3 had all already been used in predictions found on babylonian clay tablets
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: all this knowledge was transferred to the greeks probably shortly after the conquest by alexander the great 331 bc
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: according to the late classical philosopher simplicius early 6th century ad alexander ordered the translation of the historical astronomical records under supervision of his chronicler callisthenes of olynthus who sent it to his uncle aristotle
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: it is worth mentioning here that although simplicius is a very late source his account may be reliable
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: he spent some time in exile at the sassanid persian court and may have accessed sources otherwise lost in the west
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: it is striking that he mentions the title teresis greek guard which is an odd name for a historical work but is in fact an adequate translation of the babylonian title massartu meaning guarding but also observing
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: anyway aristotle's pupil callippus of cyzicus introduced his 76-year cycle which improved upon the 19-year metonic cycle about that time
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: he had the first year of his first cycle start at the summer solstice of 28 june 330 bc julian proleptic date but later he seems to have counted lunar months from the first month after alexander's decisive battle at gaugamela in fall 331 bc so callippus may have obtained his data from babylonian sources and his calendar may have been anticipated by kidinnu
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: also it is known that the babylonian priest known as berossus wrote around 281 bc a book in greek on the rather mythological history of babylonia the babyloniaca for the new ruler antiochus i it is said that later he founded a school of astrology on the greek island of kos
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: another candidate for teaching the greeks about babylonian astronomy astrology was sudines who was at the court of attalus i soter late in the 3rd century bc in any case the translation of the astronomical records required profound knowledge of the cuneiform script the language and the procedures so it seems likely that it was done by some unidentified chaldeans
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: now the babylonians dated their observations in their lunisolar calendar in which months and years have varying lengths 29 or 30 days 12 or 13 months respectively
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: at the time they did not use a regular calendar such as based on the metonic cycle like they did later but started a new month based on observations of the new moon
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this made it very tedious to compute the time interval between events
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: what hipparchus may have done is transform these records to the egyptian calendar which uses a fixed year of always 365 days consisting of 12 months of 30 days and 5 extra days this makes computing time intervals much easier
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: ptolemy dated all observations in this calendar
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: he also writes that all that he =hipparchus did was to make a compilation of the planetary observations arranged in a more useful way almagest ix.2
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: pliny states naturalis historia ii.ix(53 on eclipse predictions after their time =thales the courses of both stars =sun and moon for 600 years were prophesied by hipparchus …".
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this seems to imply that hipparchus predicted eclipses for a period of 600 years but considering the enormous amount of computation required this is very unlikely
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: rather hipparchus would have made a list of all eclipses from nabonasser's time to his own
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: other traces of babylonian practice in hipparchus work are
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: sewaktu zaman hellen astronomi babylon dan matematik exerted suatu pengaruh hebat pada ahli matematik alexandria di mesir ptolemy dan mesir rom
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: ini adalah terutamanya apparent dalam astronomi dan karya matematik hipparchus ptolemy hero dari alexandria dan diophantus
lines.name: Malay

lines.name: Malay

lines.value: itali ( ), nama rasmi republik itali ( ), ialah sebuah negara yang terletak di eropah selatan tengah

lines.value: itali bersempadan dengan perancis switzerland austria dan slovenia sepanjang pergunungan alps di utara di selatan wilayahnya merangkumi seluruh semenanjung itali sicily sardinia - dua pulau terbesar di laut mediterranean - dan banyak lagi pulau kecil

lines.value: berabad abad kemudian itali menjadi tempat kelahiran zaman pembaharuan renaissance sebuah pergerakan cendekiawan yang sangat berhasil dan terbukti penting dalam pembentukan hala tuju pemikiran eropah pada zaman seterusnya

lines.value: sepanjang sejarahnya pasca empayar rom itali terpecah belah kepada berbilang negara dan negeri kota seperti kerajaan sardinia kerajaan dua sicily dan duchy milan tetapi akhirnya disatukan pada tahun 1861 ekoran peristiwa pergolakan yang dikenali sebagai il risorgimento kebangkitan semula

lines.value: mulai akhir abad ke 19 melepasi perang dunia pertama hinggalah perang dunia kedua itali memiliki sebuah empayar jajahan yang menjangkau libya eritrea somalia habsyah albania rhodes dodecanese dan sebuah tanah konsesi di tianjin china

lines.value: ejaculation has two phases emission and ejaculation proper
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the emission phase of the ejaculatory reflex is under control of the sympathetic nervous system while the ejaculatory phase is under control of a spinal reflex at the level of the spinal nerves s2-4 via the pudendal nerve
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: during emission the two ducts known as vas deferens contract to propel sperm from the epididymis where it was stored up to the ampullae at the top end of the vas deferens
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the beginning of emission is typically experienced as a point of no return also known as point of ejaculatory inevitability
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the sperm then passes through the ejaculatory ducts and is mixed with fluids from the seminal vesicles the prostate and the bulbourethral glands to form the semen or ejaculate
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: during ejaculation proper the semen is ejected through the urethra with rhythmic contractions
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: these rhythmic contractions are part of the male orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the typical male orgasm lasts about 17 seconds but can vary from a few seconds up to about a minute
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: after the start of orgasm pulses of semen begin to flow from the urethra reach a peak discharge and then diminish in flow
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the typical orgasm consists of 10 to 15 contractions
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the rate of contractions gradually slows during the orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: initial contractions occur at an average interval of 0.6 seconds with an increasing increment of 0.1 second per contraction
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: contractions of most men proceed at regular rhythmic intervals for the duration of the orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: many men also experience additional irregular contractions at the conclusion of the orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: semen begins to spurt from the penis during the first or second contraction of orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: for most men the first spurt occurs during the second contraction
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: a small study of seven men found the initial spurt occurring on the first contraction for 2 men and occurring on the second contraction for 5 men
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: this same study showed between 26 and 60 percent of the contractions during orgasm were accompanied by a spurt of semen
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the force and amount of ejaculate vary widely from male to male
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: a normal ejaculation may contain anywhere from 1.5 to 5 milliliters
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: adult ejaculate volume is affected by the amount of time that has passed since the previous ejaculation
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: larger ejaculate volumes are seen with greater durations of abstinence
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: however a recent australian study has suggested a positive correlation between prostate cancer and infrequent ejaculation and or prostate milking which performs essentially the same function
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: that is frequent masturbation appears to reduce the risk of prostate cancer
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: frequent ejaculation is more easily obtained and sustained over time with the aid of masturbation and it is these ejaculations which are important not the mechanism
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: also the duration of the stimulation leading up to the ejaculation can affect the volume
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: abnormally low volume is known as hypospermia though it is normal for the amount of ejaculate to diminish with age
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: the number of sperm in an ejaculation also varies widely depending on many factors including the recentness of last ejaculation the average warmth of the testicles the degree and length of time of sexual excitement prior to ejaculation the age testosterone level the nutrition and especially hydration and the total volume of seminal fluid
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: an unusually low sperm count not the same as low semen volume is known as oligospermia and the absence of any sperm from the ejaculate is termed azoospermia
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: most men experience a lag time between the ability to ejaculate consecutively and this lag time varies among men
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: age also affects the recovery time younger men typically recover faster than older men
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: during this refractory period it is difficult or impossible to attain an erection because the sympathetic nervous system counteracts the effects of the parasympathetic nervous system
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: there are wide variations in how long sexual stimulation can last before ejaculation occurs
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: when a man ejaculates before he wants to it is called premature ejaculation
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: if a man is unable to ejaculate in a timely manner after prolonged sexual stimulation in spite of his desire to do so it is called delayed ejaculation or anorgasmia
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: an orgasm that is not accompanied by ejaculation is known as a dry orgasm
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: phlebopus marginatus dikenali orang ramai sebagai cendawan gam salmon di barat australia dan barangkali adalah cendawan daratan terbesar di australia dengan berat salah satu cendawan yang dikutip di victoria ialah 29 kilogram 64 paun
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: cendawan ini tampak mengagumkan di dalam hutan di tenggara dan barat daya australia
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: pada awalnya cendawan ini dinamakan sebagai boletus marginatus pada tahun 1845 malah sebelum ini terkenal dengan nama saintifik phaeogyroporus portentosus dan boletus portentosus walaupun cendawan ini jauh sekali tergolong dalam tipikal boletes seperti yang difikirkan sebelum ini
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: nama generik ini merupakan terbitan deripada perkataan greek iaitu φaebo bermaksud urat manakala nous bermaksud kaki
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: cendawan ini mungkin mencapai tumbesaran maksimum dengan garis pusat pileus berbentuk buah berangan tidak kurang 1 meter 40 inci dan liang hymenium berwarna kekuning kuningan
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: sporanya berwarna perang kekuning kuningan dan mempunyai tangkai yang tebal
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: spesimen yang matang menjadi tarikan serangga
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: phlebopus marginatus merupakan salah satu kulat gondwana di mana ditemui di australia new zealand malaysia sri lanka dan indonesia dengan spesies saudaranya ditemui di selatan amerika
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: di australia cendawan ini terdapat di hutan eucalypt dan boleh dijumpai bila bila masa khususnya selepas hujan
lines.name: Malay

lines.value: sepeti kebanyakan cendawan berasal dari australia phlebopus marginatus secara umumnya tidak diketahui statusnya sebagai makanan walaupun terdapat sebuah buku yang menerangkan cendawan ini dikatakan boleh dimakan dan rasanya agak lembut
lines.name: Malay
